channel.title: Blackbarrage OSRS Based
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/64dtzn.png[/img]
Download Client -https://dl.dropbox.com/s/pruz9zkft257qpf/Blackbarragebeta.jar?dl=0
Forums - http://blackbarragersps.forumotion.com Noticeable Features:
•Re-Sizeable Client! •Boss Pets. •Old School Runescape Items. •Achievement Diaries. •Boss & Slayer Kill Logs. •Iron-Man Mode. •Working Duel Arena. •Barrows Minigame. •Working Warriors Guild with animated armour! •Clue Scroll System - Easy, Medium & Hard. •Pest-Control Minigame. •11 Bosses + Godwars Dungeon! •All 21 Skills Working! •Working Slayer & Duo Slayer, with the ability to ask for a boss slayer task. •Working Lootshare if a Rare Drop is obtained by a player. •Working Voting & Donating Systems, with In-Game Stores. •Working PvP System (Bounty Hunter Coming Soon). Credits of Pictures (Os-Legacy)
BOSS BETS! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2rw80sw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/rkdmw8.png[/img]
Zulrah [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/szh3pg.png[/img]
Working Clue Scrolls (Chance @ 3rd age) [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/vgq1l3.png[/img]
WORKING BLOWPIPE !!! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/9jzypk.gif[/img]

item.title: Blackbarrage OSRS Based
item.dc:creator: @Twd1995 Twd1995
item.description:
@Twd1995 wrote:

Download Client -https://dl.dropbox.com/s/pruz9zkft257qpf/Blackbarragebeta.jar?dl=0

Forums - http://blackbarragersps.forumotion.com
Noticeable Features:

•Re-Sizeable Client!
•Boss Pets.
•Old School Runescape Items.
•Achievement Diaries.
•Boss & Slayer Kill Logs.
•Iron-Man Mode.
•Working Duel Arena.
•Barrows Minigame.
•Working Warriors Guild with animated armour!
•Clue Scroll System - Easy, Medium & Hard.
•Pest-Control Minigame.
•11 Bosses + Godwars Dungeon!
•All 21 Skills Working!
•Working Slayer & Duo Slayer, with the ability to ask for a boss slayer task.
•Working Lootshare if a Rare Drop is obtained by a player.
•Working Voting & Donating Systems, with In-Game Stores.
•Working PvP System (Bounty Hunter Coming Soon).
